channel.title: Neede Help with Fire Cape! PLEASE!
channel.description:
Okay i spawn a fire cape everything is okay.
I log out and log back in its not there?
Can anyone please help me?

item.title: Neede Help with Fire Cape! PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The server is probably checking to see if you’ve killed Jad, and if you haven’t it deletes it.

Client class
Remove:

if ((playerHasItem(6570) || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 6570) && killedJad == 0) { deleteItem(6570, 1); playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0, playerCape); }

Read full topic
item.source: Neede Help with Fire Cape! PLEASE!
